@graph.caption: General Tso's Tofu Sandwich. Vegan General Tso Sauce Recipe. Bake the tofu or pan fry, add blanched veggies and make a sandwich or wrap. Vegan Nut-free Recipe. can be gluten-free with gf buns or wrap. | VeganRicha.com

@graph.name: Vegan General Tso's Tofu Sandwich - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: General Tso's Tofu Sandwich. Vegan General Tso Sauce Recipe. Bake the tofu or pan fry, add blanched veggies, make a sandwich or wrap. Vegan Nut-free Recipe.

@graph.name: Vegan General Tso's Tofu Sandwich
@graph.description: General Tso's Tofu Sandwich. Vegan General Tso Sauce Recipe. Bake the tofu or pan fry, add blanched veggies and make a sandwich or wrap. Vegan Nut-free Recipe. can be gluten-free with gf buns or wrap.
recipeIngredient: 3 to 4 tbsp sugar or coconut sugar or other sweetener
1/4 cup low-sodium soy sauce (use tamari to make gluten-free)
1 tsp. sambal oelek chile paste (optional or sriracha or pepper flakes to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Press the tofu in a tofu press or in paper towels for atleast 10 mins. Slice and place in baking dish in one layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the tofu in a tofu press or in paper towels for atleast 10 mins. Slice and place in baking dish in one layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients for the sauce. mix well. I use a small blender to blend everything except garlic, then mix in minced garlic. If not using veggie broth, add a generous pinch of salt to the sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all ingredients for the sauce. mix well. I use a small blender to blend everything except garlic, then mix in minced garlic. If not using veggie broth, add a generous pinch of salt to the sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the baking dish and let sit to marinate for 15 mins or overnight for make ahead.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the baking dish and let sit to marinate for 15 mins or overnight for make ahead.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc. Bake for 25 mins or until the sauce thickens.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc. Bake for 25 mins or until the sauce thickens.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep the sandwich ingredients. Toast the bread or burger buns on a skillet over medium heat. Layer Greens, blanched broccoli slices or broccoli slaw. Thinly slice the broccoli if needed. Place the tofu slices. Pour some of the extra sauce over the tofu, sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds (optional) and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep the sandwich ingredients. Toast the bread or burger buns on a skillet over medium heat. Layer Greens, blanched broccoli slices or broccoli slaw. Thinly slice the broccoli if needed. Place the tofu slices. Pour some of the extra sauce over the tofu, sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds (optional) and serve immediately.

recipeInstructions.text: Other additions to the sandwich instead of broccoli can be thinly sliced crunchy veggies like cucumber, carrots or cabbage,some cilantro, sliced jalapeno.
recipeInstructions.name: Other additions to the sandwich instead of broccoli can be thinly sliced crunchy veggies like cucumber, carrots or cabbage,some cilantro, sliced jalapeno.

itemListElement.text: Press the tofu and slice or cube. Heat 1 tsp oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the tofu and cook until golden on some sides, 5 to 7 mins. Flip a few times in between.
itemListElement.name: Press the tofu and slice or cube. Heat 1 tsp oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the tofu and cook until golden on some sides, 5 to 7 mins. Flip a few times in between.

itemListElement.text: Prep the sauce and add to the skillet. You can also add some veggies with the sauce. Bring to a boil. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and heat. Simmer until the sauce thickens. Serve in a burger, or wraps or make a bowl with cooked rice/grains, and blanched broccoli
itemListElement.name: Prep the sauce and add to the skillet. You can also add some veggies with the sauce. Bring to a boil. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and heat. Simmer until the sauce thickens. Serve in a burger, or wraps or make a bowl with cooked rice/grains, and blanched broccoli
